name: vr
description: Set up VR player rig with proper locomotion
prompt:
Set up a VR player rig for this game. Please:

1. Create XR Rig with camera and controllers
2. Add locomotion (teleport and/or continuous movement)
3. Add interaction system (grab, UI pointer, etc.)
4. Make the rig multiplayer-ready with Normcore (RealtimeView, RealtimeAvatar)
5. Add avatar representation for other players
6. Test that VR input works

Use Unity's XR Interaction Toolkit and Normcore's multiplayer components.
